endorsements.noEndorsements: No endorsements found matching your search
endorsements.giveDescription: Endorse your colleagues for their skills and contributions
endorsements.helpColleagues: Help your colleagues by endorsing their skills and writing recommendations
endorsements.tipDescription: Endorsements help build trust and credibility. Request endorsements from colleagues you've worked with closely, and be sure to return the favor by endorsing others for their valuable contributions.
endorsements.mock1-message: I've worked with this professional on multiple large-scale events. Their organizational skills and ability to manage complex productions under pressure is exceptional. They consistently deliver high-quality results.
endorsements.mock2-message: Outstanding audio engineer with deep technical knowledge. Always ensures perfect sound quality and is quick to troubleshoot any issues. A pleasure to work with.
endorsements.mock3-message: Excellent team player and natural leader. Great at motivating crew members and maintaining positive energy even during challenging production schedules.
endorsements.mock4-message: Incredibly resourceful and thinks on their feet. I've seen them solve complex technical challenges that saved us time and money. Highly recommend!
endorsements.mock5-message: Creative and technically proficient. Has a great eye for lighting design and understands how to create the perfect atmosphere for any production.

hero.title: Solutions by Industry
hero.subtitle: Purpose-built workflows for every type of live entertainment production

concerts.title: Concerts & Touring
concerts.description: Streamline routing, budgeting, logistics, and crew management across global tour operations — from small venue runs to arena-scale productions.

festivals.title: Music & Art Festivals
festivals.description: Centralize workflows for multi-day, multi-stage events — uniting production, talent, vendors, and compliance under one command system.

immersive.title: Immersive & Experiential Events
immersive.description: Design and operate interactive worlds, installations, and branded experiences with full visibility from creative development to live execution.

theatrical.title: Theatrical & Live Productions
theatrical.description: Manage creative teams, technical schedules, and production assets for stage and performance-based entertainment.

filmTv.title: Film, TV & Media
filmTv.description: Coordinate pre-production, on-set operations, and wrap reporting with tools built for cross-departmental sync and financial transparency.

brandActivations.title: Brand Activations & Marketing Campaigns
brandActivations.description: Execute pop-ups, launches, and campaign-driven experiences — integrating creative, logistics, and ROI tracking into one intelligent dashboard.

corporate.title: Corporate & Private Events
corporate.description: Deliver flawless experiences for internal meetings, retreats, and high-profile gatherings with streamlined planning and vendor coordination.

tradeShows.title: Trade Shows & Conventions
tradeShows.description: Simplify booth builds, exhibitor logistics, and sponsor relations with end-to-end project management and real-time analytics.

wellness.title: Health, Wellness & Lifestyle
wellness.description: Optimize programming, staffing, and guest flow for retreats, fitness events, and wellness experiences — where detail and atmosphere matter most.

hero.headline: Production Management That Actually Works
hero.subheadline: Navigate your projects, crew, assets, and budgets from a single command center. Built for the people who create unforgettable experiences.
hero.supportingCopy: Whether you're producing festivals, corporate events, or immersive activations—ATLVS charts the course from concept to curtain call.
hero.trustIndicators: No credit card • 14-day trial • Cancel anytime

problem.title: The Production Chaos Problem
problem.subtitle: You know the drill
problem.pain1Description: Spreadsheets, Slack, email, that one Google Doc nobody can find—your workflow is scattered across a dozen platforms
problem.pain2Description: Critical details vanish during handoffs. Someone definitely sent that file... somewhere
problem.pain3Description: Costs creep up in the shadows. By the time you notice, you're already over
problem.pain4Description: Vendors miss updates, crew works off old info, stakeholders ask the same questions twice

solution.title: One Platform. Zero Chaos.
solution.subtitle: Everything in its right place
solution.feature1Description: Projects, people, and resources all sailing in formation
solution.feature2Description: Updates flow instantly. Everyone's working from the same chart
solution.feature3Description: Track every dollar in real-time. No surprises, no overruns
solution.feature4Description: Keep external partners in the loop without giving away the ship

howItWorks.subtitle: Set sail in minutes, not months

howItWorks.step2Description: Map out productions, activations, and workspaces
howItWorks.step3Description: Give everyone the right access and clear responsibilities
howItWorks.step4Description: Monitor progress, manage budgets, execute flawlessly

roles.title: Built for Every Role on Your Crew

legend.title: Legend
legend.description: Platform Super Admin - Full control across all organizations

phantom.name: Phantom
phantom.title: Phantom
phantom.description: Complete system administration and unrestricted access. Shape platform direction and maintain enterprise oversight.

aviator.name: Aviator
aviator.title: Aviator
aviator.description: Cross-project visibility, resource allocation, and executive analytics. Navigate high-level production strategy at scale.

gladiator.name: Gladiator
gladiator.title: Gladiator
gladiator.description: Full project creation and editing rights. Lead productions from concept to completion with complete control.

navigator.name: Navigator
navigator.title: Navigator
navigator.description: Project coordination, task assignment, and team guidance. Chart the course through complex workflows.

deviator.name: Deviator
deviator.title: Deviator
deviator.description: Focused task completion within established frameworks. Deliver quality work on assigned responsibilities.

raider.name: Raider
raider.title: Raider
raider.description: View-only access to learn and grow. Perfect for newcomers building their skills.

vendor.name: Vendor
vendor.title: Vendor
vendor.description: Targeted access for external service providers. Upload deliverables and fulfill contracted work.

visitor.name: Visitor
visitor.title: Visitor
visitor.description: Temporary, read-only access for external stakeholders. Stay informed without disrupting workflows.

partner.name: Partner
partner.title: Partner
partner.description: Deep integration for trusted external collaborators. Two-way data sharing and joint workflow management.

ambassador.name: Ambassador
ambassador.title: Ambassador
ambassador.description: Represent ATLVS, support users, and foster collaboration. Host events, create content, grow the ecosystem.

security.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
security.subtitle: Your data is protected at every level
security.feature1Description: 801 RLS policies ensure users only see what they should
security.feature3Description: All data encrypted at rest and in transit
security.feature4Description: Complete audit trail of all system activity
security.feature6Description: Full compliance with data privacy regulations

testimonials.title: Trusted by Production Teams Worldwide
testimonials.subtitle: Real stories from real producers
testimonials.testimonial1Quote: ATLVS transformed how we manage festivals. Everything in one place, everyone on the same page. Finally.
testimonials.testimonial2Quote: The RBAC system is perfect for our complex org structure. Proper access control for production? Revolutionary.
testimonials.testimonial2Role: VP of Operations, Live Events Company
testimonials.testimonial2Title: VP of Operations, Live Events Company
testimonials.testimonial3Quote: We cut budget overruns by 40% in the first quarter. The financial visibility is legitimately game-changing.
testimonials.jamesCookQuote: Managing three ships of scientists who all think they're the main character? ATLVS would've kept everyone aligned and actually working together instead of competing for credit.
testimonials.zhengYiSaoQuote: I turned piracy into a Fortune 500 company, negotiated my own amnesty, and retired wealthy. ATLVS is for people who understand that unconventional operations still need solid management.
testimonials.captainAhabQuote: Chasing one specific goal across every ocean without considering the bigger picture? ATLVS keeps you focused on the actual business plan, not just personal objectives.
testimonials.graceOMalleyQuote: Negotiated with Queen Elizabeth as equals. ATLVS helps you show up to every meeting with your data ready and your confidence up.
testimonials.sinbadQuote: The way I kept getting shipwrecked but still went back out? That's just poor planning. ATLVS provides the structure my decision-making clearly needed.
testimonials.longJohnSilverQuote: Managing pirates is literally herding cats if the cats had scurvy and trust issues. ATLVS's stakeholder management keeps everyone aligned, even when they're plotting against each other.
testimonials.horatioHornblowerQuote: Fighting the French while having a full mental breakdown is honestly very on-brand for me. ATLVS keeps all the tactical stuff organized so you can focus on the actual mission.
testimonials.captainNemoQuote: Being a hermit in a submarine is actually very introvert-coded, but even I needed team coordination. ATLVS works even when you're working alone.
testimonials.captainNemoRole: Commander, Nautilus (Twenty Thousand Leagues Under the Sea)
testimonials.odysseusQuote: Lost every single crew member because I kept making questionable choices. ATLVS would've been like 'we don't need to see what the Sirens are about' and honestly? Valid.
testimonials.odysseusRole: King of Ithaca, Greek Hero (The Odyssey)
testimonials.blackbeardQuote: Blocking an entire harbor with four ships hits different when you're coordinating manually. ATLVS would've made me the most operationally efficient pirate on the seas.
testimonials.captainMarvelQuote: Disappeared for 30 years handling space emergencies without checking in. ATLVS's communication tools would've helped me not ghost everyone I care about.
testimonials.captainJanewayQuote: I violated the Temporal Prime Directive multiple times to save my crew, but I never violated my project timelines. ATLVS keeps priorities clear even when ethics get complicated.
testimonials.captainJanewayRole: Starfleet Captain, USS Voyager (Star Trek: Voyager)
testimonials.moanaQuote: Maui was supposed to be my mentor but spent most of the time being emotionally unavailable. ATLVS tracks deliverables when your team is being difficult.
testimonials.captainJackSparrowQuote: Managing a crew when literally no one knows if they're employed or just along for the chaos? ATLVS provides clarity that my entire vibe does not.
testimonials.captainJackSparrowRole: Pirate Captain, Black Pearl (Pirates of the Caribbean)
testimonials.popeyeQuote: My whole personality is 'stubbornly refuses to plan ahead.' ATLVS is the adult in the room that I clearly need but won't admit to.
testimonials.captainPicardQuote: Leading a diverse crew through first contact situations and diplomatic crises? ATLVS keeps everyone aligned when the stakes are literally galactic.
testimonials.captainPicardRole: Starfleet Captain, USS Enterprise (Star Trek: TNG)
testimonials.captainSiskoQuote: Commanding a station that's part military base, part trading hub, part refugee center? ATLVS helps you manage complexity when every stakeholder has different priorities.
testimonials.captainSiskoRole: Starfleet Commander, Deep Space Nine (Star Trek: DS9)

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know
faq.question1: How long is the free trial?
faq.answer1: 14 days, no credit card required. Full access to all features.
faq.answer2: Yes. Cancel anytime. No long-term contracts or commitments.
faq.question3: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer3: We accept all major credit cards, ACH, and wire transfers for enterprise plans.
faq.answer4: Yes. Enterprise-grade encryption, SOC 2 compliant, GDPR ready. Your data is protected at every level.
faq.answer5: Yes. Self-service resources for all plans, plus dedicated training for Enterprise customers.
faq.question6: Can I import my existing data?
faq.answer6: Yes. We provide CSV import tools and can assist with custom data migrations for Enterprise plans.
faq.q1: How long is the free trial?
faq.a1: 14 days, no credit card required. Full access to all features.
faq.a2: Yes. Cancel anytime. No long-term contracts or commitments.

faq.a3: We accept all major credit cards, ACH, and wire transfers for enterprise plans.
faq.a4: Yes. Enterprise-grade encryption, SOC 2 compliant, GDPR ready. Your data is protected at every level.
faq.a5: Yes. Self-service resources for all plans, plus dedicated training for Enterprise customers.

faq.a6: Yes. We provide CSV import tools and can assist with custom data migrations for Enterprise plans.

problem.pain1Description: Too many apps, too much chaos. Everything's scattered and hard to find 🤯
problem.pain2Description: Files disappear into the void. Someone sent it... somewhere... good luck! 🔍
problem.pain3Description: Money keeps disappearing. By the time you notice, you're over budget 😬
problem.pain4Description: People miss updates, work with old info, ask the same questions

solution.title: One App. Full Control. 💪
solution.subtitle: Everything you need in one place
solution.feature1Description: All projects, team & gear in one dashboard
solution.feature2Description: Updates happen in real-time. Everyone stays connected
solution.feature3Description: Watch every dollar. No surprises, no stress
solution.feature4Description: Keep everyone in the loop and working together

hero.headline: Professional Production Management Solutions
hero.subheadline: Comprehensive project, workforce, asset, and financial management from a centralized platform. Designed for professionals who deliver exceptional experiences.
hero.supportingCopy: From festivals to corporate events and immersive experiences—ATLVS provides the structure and oversight needed for successful production management.

problem.title: The Production Management Challenge
problem.subtitle: Industry-wide inefficiencies
problem.pain1Description: Teams utilize multiple disconnected platforms including spreadsheets, email, and various project management tools
problem.pain2Description: Critical project details are lost during transitions and team handoffs
problem.pain3Description: Without proper financial oversight, costs exceed projections
problem.pain4Description: Vendors, crew members, and stakeholders experience coordination difficulties

solution.title: Comprehensive Platform. Complete Control.
solution.subtitle: Integrated production management
solution.feature1Description: All projects, personnel, and resources managed from one location
solution.feature2Description: Instant synchronization ensures all team members have current information
solution.feature3Description: Track budgets, expenses, and invoices with precision and accuracy
solution.feature4Description: Streamline external partner relationships and deliverables

testimonials.testimonial1Quote: ATLVS has transformed our festival management operations. The centralized platform provides the structure and oversight we need.
testimonials.testimonial2Quote: The role-based access control system is exactly what our organization required. Professional-grade security and permissions.
testimonials.testimonial3Quote: We reduced budget overruns by 40% in the first quarter. The financial visibility and reporting capabilities are exceptional.

hero.headline: Production Management That Doesn't Waste Your Time

hero.supportingCopy: Festivals, corporate events, immersive experiences—ATLVS gets out of your way so you can get things done.
